hero.title: Our Journey
hero.subtitle: From concept to competition
hero.description: Follow our progression from a group of passionate students to one of the UK's most successful F1 in Schools teams.

divisions.name: Development Class
divisions.subtitle: Our Foundation Season
divisions.description: Where it all began - learning, growing, and achieving beyond our expectations

milestones.title: Team Formation
milestones.description: Six A-Level students from Silverstone UTC came together with a shared vision of motorsport excellence and STEM innovation.
details: Established roles and responsibilities across engineering, design, marketing, and finance
Set ambitious goals for our debut season
Began initial car design concepts and research

milestones.title: Regional Competition
milestones.description: Secured 2nd place at West Midlands Regionals and earned nomination for Best Pit Display.
details: Competed against established teams with our debut car
Impressed judges with innovative pit display design
Qualified for UK National Finals
Became the highest-placing team from Silverstone UTC

milestones.title: Carbon Neutral Certification
milestones.description: Achieved 100% carbon neutrality through partnership with TwoEighty sustainability consultants.
details: Calculated complete carbon footprint using Greenhouse Gas Protocol
Offset 1.75 tonnes of CO2 equivalent emissions
Planted two trees through verified reforestation programmes
Became pioneers in sustainable motorsport

milestones.title: Silverstone Partnership
milestones.description: Secured title sponsorship from Silverstone Circuit - the home of British Motorsport.
details: Gained backing from the most prestigious motorsport venue in the UK
Established credibility and professional recognition
Strengthened brand identity and team profile
Opened doors to further sponsorship opportunities

milestones.title: National Finals
milestones.description: Achieved 7th place nationally and won Best Pit Display at the UK National Finals.
details: Competed against the UK's top F1 in Schools teams
Won Best Pit Display with innovative design featuring Meyer Sound audio
Placed 7th out of all Development Class teams nationally
Completed Development Class as the most successful team from our school

divisions.name: Professional Class
divisions.subtitle: The Next Chapter
divisions.description: Stepping up to compete at the highest level with our sights set on world finals

milestones.title: Professional Registration
milestones.description: Official registration for Professional Class competition with enhanced requirements and global opportunities.
details: Advanced engineering portfolio requirements
Comprehensive business plan development
Enhanced safety and technical regulations
Pathway to World Finals qualification

milestones.title: Advanced Car Development
milestones.description: Design and manufacture of our next-generation RR3 car with professional-level specifications.
details: Advanced CFD analysis and aerodynamic optimization
Precision 5-axis CNC manufacturing
Professional-grade materials and finishing
Extensive testing and development programme

milestones.title: Professional Regionals
milestones.description: Competing in Professional Class regionals with qualification goals for nationals.
details: Elevated competition standards and judging criteria
Advanced presentation and portfolio requirements
Professional-level pit display and brand execution
Regional championship qualification pathway

milestones.title: World Finals Qualification
milestones.description: Our ultimate goal - representing Great Britain at the F1 in Schools World Finals.
details: Compete against the world's best student teams
Showcase British engineering excellence globally
Achieve international recognition for our innovations
Inspire the next generation of STEM students
